channel.title: Skillcape bug
channel.description:
After hours of trying to figure out how to add skillcape emotes i finally got it. There seems to be a problem though. When i perform the emote, it seems to have a problem with the height. If anyone has a fix or any idea whats wrong i would appreciate the help. Thanks
as you can see in the picture, the emote is occuring over my head.
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/8ycdae.png[/img]
